subject: Running
New York City Marathon
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Shay, who died during the Olympic trial for the marathon, had cardiac arrhythmia caused by an enlarged heart and died of natural causes, according to the New York City medical examiner’s office.
snippet: Ryan Shay, who died during the Olympic trial for the marathon, had cardiac arrhythmia caused by an enlarged heart and died of natural causes, according to the New York City medical examiner’s office.
